name: CELUSTA
description:
CELUSTA,

WE ARE LOST IN A BITTER STORM, YOUR DRUM MUST BEAT TO GUIDE THE OARSMEN.

DO NOT IDLE, AS SOMETHING LURKS BENEATH THE ICY WATERS...

Built over 2 days at JAMBRIDGE for LUDUM DARE:

Art - Katy Marshall

Design and Programming - Alex Johansson

Enemy Behaviour - Miguel

Audio - Sebastian Peters

MIDI Drum Hacker - Kim Spence
